API.Comments: Returns the name of this logger.
Checks if a message of the given level would be logged by this logger.
Logs a message produced from the given object.
Logs a message with an optional list of parameters.
API.Function: log(System.Logger.Level level, String format, Object... params)

API.Comments: Logs a message associated with a given throwable.
API.Function: log(System.Logger.Level level, String msg, Throwable thrown)

API.Comments: Logs a lazily supplied message associated with a given throwable.
API.Function: log(System.Logger.Level level, Supplier<String> msgSupplier, Throwable thrown)

API.Comments: Logs a message with resource bundle and an optional list of parameters.
API.Function: log(System.Logger.Level level, ResourceBundle bundle, String format, Object... params)

API.Comments: Logs a localized message associated with a given throwable.
API.Function: log(System.Logger.Level level, ResourceBundle bundle, String msg, Throwable thrown)
